item.description:
St. Patrick’s Day Parade
March 15, 2009
South Boston, MA
11:00 meet at Broadway Station, South Boston
Wini’s Cell Phone 617-834-6292

It’s that time for the wearin’ of the green and marching in the St Pat’s Day Parade. This is a 3.2 mile walk, http://www.southiepar... and we have had a great time in the past. After the parade we go to The Fowler House Café, http://www.fowlerhous..., 1049 Hancock St., Quincy, MA to relax and have a few.

We meet at the Broadway “T” station to wait our turn to march. If you plan on driving, park at the Andrew “T” stop (the end of the parade) and take the red line in-bound one stop.

Please let me know if you are up to have too much fun and will join me for a modest walk through South Boston.
item.name: BBTC Annual St Pat's Parade
